name: Octopus (Itizso)
description:
Playable 3D simulation of this   classic handheld electronic game including views of the original packaging and instruction guide . A RetroFab simulation Version 0.9.1 (beta) Details Title Octopus Model No. OC-22 Series Game & Watch (Widescreen) Manufacturer Nintendo Release Date July 16, 1981 Chipset Sharp SM5A ( 32.768 kHz ) Description

Dive to retrieve treasure from a sunken ship but watch out for the giant octopus guarding it.

Gameplay

Descend from the boat towards the sunken treasure by moving RIGHT. Watch out for the tentacles of the giant octopus. If it touches you you'll lose one life. When you reach the treasure use the RIGHT button to collect some gems. If you have time grab the treasure multiple times for more points. Return to the boat to offload your treasure and gain some bonus points. Lose 3 lives and the game is over.

Controls Keyboard Left A or Left Arrow Right D or Right Arrow Mouse Rotate Drag Press Left-click Zoom Mousewheel Resources Audio David Haywood ( youtube.com ) Box Art Nintandbox ( nintandbox.net ) Instructions Torsten Lindh ( intheattic.co.uk ) Textures Lee Robson ( progettosnaps.net )
